name: Seth's Slide 'Em Up! - *Demo*
description:
Seth's Slide 'Em Up! is a puzzle game where you slide along a grid, assassinating guards to get to the exit!  Game is currently a demo with a cut off at 15 levels.

Winner of the GXC Community Showcase winner for Best Level Design.

Current Features:

- 15 puzzles at the moment taking advantage of 2 different enemy types and the mighty sliding block

- Finishing the level will take you to the next level. Finishing each level in the minimum number of moves will award you with different characters and weapons to use!

- Fully functional with mouse, keyboard, and touch controls.

Upcoming Features:

- 60 intended puzzles

- 30 unlockable characters, 30 unlockable weapons

- 3 different worlds

- 2 additional block types, 2 additional enemy types
